version_description: • CT17 Preparations
• Bug fixes
• Improved live match update speed
• Improved live match information display

• Added live Champions Trophy match audio
• Bug fixes

Our latest version is packed with updates to help fans follow the action as excitement builds ahead of the ICC Women’s World Cup!

• New-look WWC17 theme applied
• Ball-by-ball coverage of every WWC17 match
• Visual enhancements
• FanScore integration for WWC17
• Oppo Photo of the Day for WWC17
• Nissan Play of the Day for WWC17
• Introduction of Women’s World Cup Fantasy
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Download the update for the latest scores, stats, news and highlights and be sure to join the conversation at #WWC17!

Follow the ICC Women’s World Cup action with the official ICC app! This update includes:

• New player headshots and additional profile detail
• Fantasy promo added to home screen
• Visual improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Download the update for the latest scores, stats, news and highlights and be sure to join the conversation at #WWC17!
• Tweaks and UI improvements
• Fixed text issue
• Latest section updates
• Switch to full international cricket coverage

• Added ball by ball commentary
• Updated live blog functionality
• New floating video functionality
• Additional filter options for fixtures and results

In this latest update of the ICC app, we've made some big improvements to calendars, video and our Match Centre to make it easier than ever before to follow international cricket across the world!

Key updates include:

● Revised calendar view with teams, tours, and format specific search options;
● New picture-in-picture video view;
● New live match panel takeover;
● 'Runs required to win' added to Match Centre and;
● General performance updates and bug fixes.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing us at: social@icc-cricket.com

In this latest update of the ICC app, we've made some big improvements to Rankings, Homepage and our Match Centre to make it easier than ever before to follow international cricket across the world!

Key updates include:

- New updated Rankings section;
- New Live Blog icons added to Match Centre;
- Match Centre team lists given a new look;
- Updates to support iPhone X users;
- General performance updates and bug fixes.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com
Bug fixes and improvements.

- Launch of the 2017 ICC Awards - vote for your Fan’s Moment of the Year!
- ICC Rankings added to home screen
- Full scorecard now available for completed matches
- General updates and fixes

In the latest update of the ICC app, we've added a range of new features ahead of the Under 19 Cricket World Cup in New Zealand. We've created a brand new Under 19 section to ensure you won't miss a second of the action. Other updates include:

- Dedicated team pages for all 16 nations
- Updates to our Match Centre live blog
- Fixtures, results, stats and video for every game

Your number one destination for following World Cricket.

- Enhancements to live match blog presentation
- Addition of in-stream match video highlights
- Addition of in-stream match photos
- General updates
- Enhancement to Live Blog presentation

In this latest update of the ICC app, we‘ve added a brand new section dedicated to the ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier in Zimbabwe to ensure you don’t miss a second of the action.

Key updates include:
- Dedicated CWCQ section including news, fixtures, video and stats for every game;
- Team pages for every competing nation;
- New splash screen update;
- New homepage features including video carousel;
- Updates to MRF Tyres rankings predictor.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

In this latest update of the ICC app, we've introduced the popular Rankings Predictor feature! How will your predictions impact the MRF Tyres Rankings?

Key updates include:

- New Rankings Predictor section;
- Splash screen update for #CWCQ;
- Minor homepage and fixtures/results page updates;
- General performance updates and bug fixes.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

As Afghanistan and the West Indies move on to the ICC Cricket World Cup, we bid farewell to the dedicated CWCQ section (but you can still re-live the action in our news and video archive!)

If you are using an iPhone X, you now have a new option to view our Match Centre with the introduction of a new landscape layout.

As always, please get in touch with your feedback at social@icc-cricket.com

In this latest update of the ICC app, we've made some minor bug fixes and improvements.

Our latest key update includes:

- All new team pages! Easily view your country’s fixtures, videos, photos, rankings and latest news. Currently available for all Full Members with Associate Members coming soon.

- Women’s player ranking tabs for ODI and T20I so you can better keep track of who’s leading the way in the women’s game.

Make sure you have your app updates turned on to make sure you never miss out on our new features and improvements!

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

Our latest update for iOS includes the usual minor bug fixes and product enhancements to improve your ICC experience.

We’ve also made it easier to follow your favourite women’s teams and improved the MRF Tyres Rankings Predictor so you can better calculate who you think will rule the world!

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

#WatchThis!

With the Women’s World T20 just around the corner, our latest app update ensures everything is ready for you to follow all the action from the Caribbean!

Thanks for your continued support. Feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

#WatchThis!

Ahead of the Women’s World T20 in the West Indies we’re excited to release a brand new version of the official ICC mobile app! This update has a fresh new look and feel, enhanced video section, stats, fixtures & results, team pages and more.

For the first time ever, you can also create an official ICC account, an all-new feature that allows us to personalise your experience. There’s also an Apple Watch extension to keep you up to date with live scores, fixtures and results.

#WatchThis!

Ahead of the Women’s World T20 in the West Indies we’re excited to release a brand new version of the official ICC mobile app! This update has a fresh new look and feel, enhanced video section, stats, fixtures & results, team pages and more.

For the first time ever, you can also create an official ICC account, an all-new feature that allows us to personalise your experience. There’s also an Apple Watch extension to keep you up to date with live scores, fixtures and results.

With less than six months to go until the Cricket World Cup 2019, we’ve released a #CWC19 tournament section in this latest update of the official ICC mobile App!

You’ll find all you need to know about the event in England and Wales including tournament fixtures, venues, team pages for those involved and of course, ticket information on how to be there – but you’ll need to be quick as they’re running out fast!!

You can also follow the Trophy Tour live and get involved in the build up to the event in your area!

Alongside this we’ve made huge improvements to the app with a brand new look and feel, updated the video section and added the ability to personalise your experience including following your favourite team. There’s also 24/7, 365 day coverage to keep you up to date with all the latest news, scores and video from the world, so if you’re a fan of international cricket, download the latest version now!

In the latest update for the official ICC mobile app we’ve Included some minor bug fixes and product enhancements to improve your overall experience.

We’ve also improved the live match scores and MRF Tyres Rankings section.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

In the latest update for the official ICC mobile app we are starting our build-up to the ICC Cricket World Cup 2019.

Browse our dedicated tournament section that offers the fan all of the key info ahead of cricket's showpiece event - tickets, fixtures, news, video, archive & more.

We’ve have also included some minor bug fixes and product enhancements to improve your overall experience.

Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

There have been countless memorable moments in the storied history of the ICC Cricket World Cup. Legends were made, champions created. Now, the ICC is seeking your help to vote for the most defining moments of the World Cup! Was it Jonty running out Inzamam? MS Dhoni's winning six? Australia's dramatic win over South Africa in 1999? Make your voice heard and download the update today!

With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup approaching, get in the mood for cricket's biggest celebration with two of our new features:

- Greatest XI: Choose which of the game's legends will make your all-time World Cup XI
- Quiz: How well do you know your World Cup history?
Pad up and grab your bat. We've given the ICC app a bold new facelift in readiness for the Men's Cricket World Cup 2019!

Pad up and grab your bat. We've given the ICC app a bold new facelift in readiness for the Men's Cricket World Cup 2019!

- Added warmup fixtures
- Various bug fixes

With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup just two weeks away, we have added a whole bunch of features:

- Follow the action in four languages with news in English, Hindi, Bengali and Urdu
- Brand new notification service to give you the updates you need
- Going to a match? Check out our matchday selector to improve your day out

Are you in?

With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup just days away, we have added a whole bunch of updates:

- Updated homescreen giving you the content you need most during tournament time
- CWC19 Player Tournament Statistics
- Performance updates in this year's brand new match centre
- Share Key Player cards direct from the match centre to your friends on social

With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup just days away, we have added a whole bunch of updates:

- Updated homescreen giving you the content you need most during tournament time
- CWC19 Player Tournament Statistics
- Performance updates in this year's brand new match centre
- Share Key Player cards direct from the match centre to your friends on social

- Updated homescreen giving you the content you need most during tournament time
- CWC19 Player Tournament Statistics
- Performance updates in this year's brand new match centre
- Share Key Player cards direct from the match centre to your friends on social
- Bug fixes and enhancements

With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup in full swing, we have added a whole bunch of updates:


- Updated homescreen giving you quick access to the top features

- Access to the official ICC Dream 11 Fantasy game

- Animated run chase graph in match centres

- Improved Team pages giving you the key information on your favourite team

- Improved statistics

- Updated video content in the Video Hub

- Bug fixes

Are you in? With the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup well underway, we have made some great feature updates:

- All-time Cricket World Cup player stats,
- Enhanced stats on player pages,
- Match Centre improvements,
- Bug fixes.

Are you in? The ICC Men's Cricket World Cup is well underway, and we've made the following enhancements:

- Tap a player headshot to be taken straight to their player page
- Access the Player Xl in the live match state
- Bug fixes.

The ICC Men's Cricket World Cup champion has been crowned!

Now is your chance to decide the Play of the Tournament, which has been added to the app along with a few minor bug fixes and enhancements.

- The World Test Championship is here! Our latest app update includes everything you need to know about the brand new ICC event about to sweep the world.
- While the CWC19 party is over (congratulations England!), you can keep up with the latest scores, news, video and features from the world of cricket as our app reverts to ICC.
- With the World Test Championship, both men's and women's Ashes, Ireland's inaugural Test and a range of qualifying events for the T20 World Cup - there's plenty to look forward to!
- Plus the usual bug fixes and updates to keep your app running faster than a Jofra Archer short ball!

Our latest update gets you ready for the T20 World Cup Qualifying action set to take place in Scotland and the United Arab Emirates.
As always, we'll bring you the latest news, features and video highlights so you can stay close to the action and find out which teams will book their tickets to Australia 2020!
Thanks for your continued support, feel free to reach us with any feedback or product requests by emailing: social@icc-cricket.com

The Womens T20 World Cup 2020 is finally here and to celebrate we've launched the official #T20WorldCup tournament app with everything you need to know about the event including fixtures, results, in game-videos, highlights, news, team & player profiles and much, much more!

The Women's T20 World Cup 2020 is at the business end of the tournament and you can now view the team and player All-Time Stats leaderboards, as well as, finding everything you need to know about the event including fixtures, results, in game-videos, highlights, news, team & player profiles and much, much more!

The #1 App for International Cricket is back following the ICC Women's T20 World Cup! The ICC mobile app provides everything you need to know about the world of mens and womens International cricket including fixtures, results, videos, news, team & player rankings and much, much more!

In the latest update to the official ICC mobile app, we are launching a brand new video archive section ‘From the Vault’ bringing you best moments from the ICC video archive.
Over time, we’ll bring you highlights and premium content from our entire back catalog but to mark the anniversary of the Men’s Cricket World Cup 2019, we’re reliving every match from last summer in England and Wales.
Alongside this, we’ve made some improvements to our homepage, rankings section and push notifications.
We value your continued feedback so if you have any comments or want us to improve specific features let us know by emailing us at: social@icc-cricket.com

International Cricket is back! With the latest update of the ICC mobile app we'll bring you all the news and coverage of upcoming fixtures.
We've improved our ‘From the Vault’ section bringing you the best moments from the ICC video archive and ahead of the annual Hall of Fame awards we've revamped the section for this year's inductees.
Download the latest update now!
If you have any comments or want us to improve specific features let us know by emailing us at: social@icc-cricket.com

Do you consider yourself a cricket tragic? Do you know which player has scored the most double centuries in international Cricket or which team have recorded the highest successful chase at an ICC event?
In the latest update of the ICC mobile app we have released our new MRF Tyres Quiz feature where you can show off your knowledge of the game.
Each week we will have a new topic for you to challenge yourself! First up, its the Inaugural T20 World Cup from 2007 so if you think you have what it takes, download the latest version of the ICC mobile App and challenge yourself now.

ICC Player Rankings updates including...
• All-Time Rankings - search back through international cricket history to see the top players of yesteryear
• Best Ever Rankings - compare and contrast eras with our 'Best Ever' tables that surfaces the highest rated players of all-time
• Player Comparison - go head-to-head with any player from international cricket history
Have your say in the ICC Awards of the Decade now! Vote for your favourites and have a chance to win exclusive money can't buy prizes.
You had your say in the ICC Awards of the Decade, but have you created your Dream 11 ODI Team of the Decade yet?
General bug fixes and performance enhancements

Ahead of the World Test Championship Final, we’ve added some new features to get you in the mood as New Zealand and India bid to become inaugural champions of the event.

We’ll have an array of exclusive content, player features and in game clips and match highlights direct from the event! Plus we’ll be having a special induction to the ICC Hall of Fame, celebrating the history of Test Cricket which you won’t want to miss.

Download the latest version of the official ICC Mobile app now!
